question: What is the theme of the 9th edition of Sustainable Mountain Summit?
option1: Emerging Pathways for Building a Resilient Post COVID-19 Strong Economy
option2: Emerging Pathways for Building a Resilient Post COVID-19 Mountain Economy, Adaptation, Innovation and Acceleration.
answer: Emerging Pathways for Building a Resilient Post COVID-19 Mountain Economy, Adaptation, Innovation and Acceleration.
explanation: The 9th edition of the Sustainable Mountain Summit has been started in Dehradun. The theme of the summit is ,"Emerging Pathways for Building a Resilient Post COVID-19 Mountain Economy, Adaptation, Innovation and Acceleration."
